article_title: EXCLUSIVE: Education, race relations top agenda for SC Democrats, poll shows
article_text:
75 percent of S.C. Democrats voters want their party’s candidates for governor to push education as top issue

Improving race relations, gun control also rated high priorities

Only 36 percent of S.C. Democrats say abortion rights should be a top issue

article_metadata.news-keywords: Sc, south carolina, politics, winthrop, university, poll, democrats, charleston massacre, gun control, race relations, education, medicaid, nikki haley
article_metadata.description: Improving education and race relations should be at the top of the agenda for any S.C. Democratic candidate for governor, a new poll says.
article_metadata.title: EXCLUSIVE: Education, race relations top agenda for SC Democrats, poll shows | The State
